publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7777 John Wilson: Airdrie Savings Bank Leads the Way on Banking—That the Parliament congratulates Airdrie Savings Bank, Scotland’s only remaining independent bank, for recently announcing record lending figures, with the expectation of further growth in 2011; recognises that Airdrie Savings Bank loaned more than £36 million last year, which was an increase of 24% on the previous 12 months; considers that this demonstrates how small banks are leading the way in providing much-needed loans and financial assistance to small businesses and individuals during this difficult economic period, and further considers that this is in sharp contrast to the big banks that are providing fewer loans while continuing to pay huge bonuses to bankers. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Michael Matheson*, Bob Doris*
S3M-7777 Airdrie Savings Bank Leads the Way on Banking (lodged on 24 January 2011) David Whitton*, Jamie Hepburn*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-7777 Airdrie Savings Bank Leads the Way on Banking (lodged on 24 January 2011) Hugh Henry*
S3M-7777 Airdrie Savings Bank Leads the Way on Banking (lodged on 24 January 2011) Gil Paterson*

S3M-7777 John Wilson: Airdrie Savings Bank Leads the Way on Banking—That the Parliament congratulates Airdrie Savings Bank, Scotland’s only remaining independent bank, for recently announcing record lending figures, with the expectation of further growth in 2011; recognises that Airdrie Savings Bank loaned more than £36 million last year, which was an increase of 24% on the previous 12 months; considers that this demonstrates how small banks are leading the way in providing much-needed loans and financial assistance to small businesses and individuals during this difficult economic period, and further considers that this is in sharp contrast to the big banks that are providing fewer loans while continuing to pay huge bonuses to bankers. Supported by: Robin Harper, Rob Gibson, Sandra White, Bill Kidd, Kenneth Gibson, Brian Adam, Hugh O’Donnell, Michael Matheson, Bob Doris, David Whitton, Jamie Hepburn, Joe FitzPatrick, Hugh Henry, Gil Paterson, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-7777 Airdrie Savings Bank Leads the Way on Banking (lodged on 24 January 2011) Maureen Watt*
